sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const CardDetail = (props) => (
{props.selected_card && props.selected_card.dt &&

{ props.isToday ? `Today in ${props.address}` : new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-GB', { weekday: 'short' }) .format(new Date(props.selected_card.dt_txt)) }

{new Intl.DateTimeFormat('en-GB', { timeZone: 'GMT', hour12: true, hour: 'numeric', minute: 'numeric', }).format(new Date(props.selected_card.dt_txt))}

  • Humidity

    {props.selected_card.main.humidity}%

  • Wind

    {props.selected_card.wind.speed} km/h

    • {props.selected_card.rain && props.selected_card.rain['3h'] &&
  • Rain

    Last 3h: {new Intl.NumberFormat('en-GB',{ maximumFractionDigits: 2 }).format(props.selected_card.rain['3h'])} mm

    • }
  • Maximun Temp.

    {props.selected_card.main.temp_max}°

  • Minimum Temp.

    {props.selected_card.main.temp_min}°

  • Pressure

    {props.selected_card.main.pressure} hPa

  • Sea level

    {props.selected_card.main.sea_level} hPa

  • Ground level

    {props.selected_card.main.grnd_level} hPa

  • Wind

    Speed: {props.selected_card.wind.speed}m/s

}
) export default CardDetail;
